topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556a1489636872377a5b1600#post_556a1489636872377a5b1600
I'm not saying that it can't be good, rather considering how often video game movies wind up getting fucked up being pessimistic about the quality of the movie isn't a stretch.

To use an analogy it'd be like someone saying that Michael Bay is making a good movie; considering how many bad movies he's made it's not that much of a stretch to be pessimistic about his latest movie.

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556a158f6368723786171800#post_556a158f6368723786171800
Bay usually makes 5/10 movies designed to sell well, but he's smart enough to make good movies if he cared too, he just prefers his mass produced money makers,

And again though WC has all the things those other games lacked, an epic story a huge cast of interesting characters on both sides of the conflict, and even has the fact that it will have a downer ending going for it,
topics.author: 509f70a87f123b77eb0004fd

Personally I'm skeptical it will be made though, a lot of these movies get announced but we never see a trailer.

And again though WC has all the things those other games lacked, an epic story a huge cast of interesting characters on both sides of the conflict, and even has the fact that it will have a downer ending going for it,[/bq]
I think you're misunderstanding me.

I give it a 1/2 chance that it might be good, but I'm also giving it a 1/2 chance that it might be a bad movie.  I'm waiting to see if it's a good movie before getting excited.

Hopefully Warcraft won't fall into the same pit.
topics.author: 500757fd7f123b75a90003b1

topics.body:
My opinion on video game movies
Mortal Kombat is good since it actually got the story and some of the characters correctly 

I like Street Fighter because the characters match their designs, they do some of their moves, and it's just a fun, silly movie

I like the Mario Bros movie despite all it's problems
It's a fun movie if you accept what it is
And if you made an actually accurate live action Mario Bros movie, it would have been just as dumb, admit it
